Paragraph: 44,45 It was realized that by switching the spacer between the IDT and NT units , the processability , backbone planarity , charge carrier mobility and film morphology can be optimized.

| --- |

| NT |

The two material names identified in the paragraph are "IDT" and "NT". They are mentioned in the context of switching the spacer between these two materials to optimize certain properties.

After re-evaluating the paragraph, the two material names "IDT" and "NT" are still the only valid entities that can be identified. They are mentioned in the context of switching the spacer between these two materials to optimize certain properties. The other terms in the paragraph, such as "processability," "backbone planarity," "charge carrier mobility," and "film morphology" are not material names.
